long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Screenshot Canvas

Simplify your screenshots with customizable backgrounds!

Tired of wasting time editing your screenshots to remove cluttered backgrounds? Screenshot Canvas gives you complete control over your screenshot backgrounds with plain colors or custom images. Perfect for professionals, designers, or anyone who wants clean, distraction-free screenshots.

Key Features:
• Plain Backgrounds: Instantly switch to a solid color background to hide your desktop or any distractions in your screenshots.
• Custom Images: Upload your own background image for a personalized touch.
• Background Modes: Choose between Fill, Repeat, or Center modes to control how your background displays.
• Privacy Protection: Keep your personal or work-related desktop private by hiding everything behind a clean, consistent background.
• One-Click Reset: Easily clear or reset your background settings with a single click.

Screenshot Canvas is your simple, time-saving solution for capturing clean and professional-looking screenshots every time. No more tedious background removal—just select your background and start capturing!

Privacy Policy:
Screenshot Canvas does not collect, store, or share any personal data. All background settings are saved locally on your device.
